procedure.title: Programme Management Services: Site Acquisition, Site Capital Appraisal and General Property Services for School Educational Projects Nationwide
procedure.description: Programme Management Services: Site Acquisition, Site Capital Appraisal and General Property Services for School Educational Projects Nationwide, across 3 strands: Strand 1- Site Identification (options) and acquisition of preferred site option (procurement and management of multi-disciplinary team) Strand 2- Capital Appraisal, project appraisal and viability (procurement and management of multi-disciplinary team) Strand 3- Property and Asset Management (procurement and management of property management company(s))
